title: CHAPTER I A Greeting by Way of Dedication

book.title: The British Navy in Battle
book.description: 简介： We do not wish you a Merry Christmas, for to none of us, neither to you at sea nor to us on land, can Christmas be a merry season now. Nor, amid so much misery and sorrow, does it seem, at first sight, reasonable to carry the conventional phrase furt...
